name: Programmer's Adventure - Code The Sheep
description:
Have you ever wondered how programmers write code? Well, this puzzle game will let you try yourself as a programmer.

***

If you liked it - consider rating it on GooglePlay, or you might try yourself at designing levels? Either way it will mean the world to me!

***

Each level you have to create an algorithm that will help the sheep to reach all the carrots on the map. Use recursion to your advantage and come up with cunning solutions.
Learn how to create a step by step algorithms and think logically.
It doesn't matter how old you are - this puzzle game is for everyone!
